help-file.title: NCHAT
help-file.content:
Syntax: nchat hi there
This is a communications channel for new players to the game to talk to others on their own racewar side at lower levels. It can also be used as a means to gain information and help in regard to the game.
This channel will remain open to you only until you reach a certain level. However there will be a set of higher level, more experienced players within the game that have special access to this channel who will provide assistance and help where they are able.
